overview: As London River leaves for work, Alina Lopez grabs her mother's laptop to finish some homework. To her surprise, she uncovers a secret folder filled with erotic stories. After reading one of them, she quickly realizes that it's a steamy romance between step-mother and step-daughter. However, the characters are so familiar... Kristen Scott is shocked after discovering her step-mom with another woman. Kristen is appalled, although she slowly calms down as Elexis Monroe pleads for forgiveness and was hoping Kristen would understand since she's gay. Although Elexis hesitates at first, they soon come together for an explorative kiss. Gianna Gem is flustered as she admits that her school friends make fun of her because they think Sovereign Syre, her stepmom and school teacher... has the HOTS for her. Sovereign lets out a laugh. Of course there's no truth to THAT! Gianna looks confused as she tries to resist answering, but soon admits that she... maybe has a bit of a crush on Sovereign.
title: Fam Fiction
